kizuna_friend_d_03:
Gwah! I was focusing so hard, I didn’t even
notice you, bud![npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_04:
Hehe... I know, I know. Pretty rare to see me
actually studying, right?[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_05:
But I’m at a pretty good stopping point. How
about a break? I could use a change of scenery.[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_06:
What do you think? Welcome to Chez Arven!
Well, Chez Arven and Mabosstiff, really.[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_07a:
Hehehe... Yeah, I know, right?\c
Wait—what screams “Arven” to you?[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_07b:
Why’s that surprising?! I’ll have you know that I
clean every single day!\c
Mostly ’cause Mabosstiff sheds a ton, but still...[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_08:
Anyway, uh... About the reason you saw me
studying in the classroom like that...[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_09a:
I went back and read the pages about the Herba
Mystica in the Scarlet Book again.[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_09b:
I went back and read the pages about the Herba
Mystica in the Violet Book again.[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_10:
It made me remember how things were back
when Mabosstiff was all weak and everything.[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_11:
I couldn’t seem to do anything to help him, and...
boy, it sure didn’t feel good.[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_12:
’Course, I’m really glad that I was able to find
all the Herba Mystica together with you.[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_13:
But there’s got to be other people who are still
suffering the same way I was back then, worrying\r
about their Pokémon that’re sick or hurt.[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_14:
So... So I...I, uh...\c
Don’t laugh, OK?[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_15: I’ve decided that I...I’m gonna become a cook![npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_16:
I’m gonna make super healthy food, bursting
full of the stuff Pokémon need to feel great![npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_select_03: I’ll be behind you all the way!
kizuna_friend_d_select_04: I’m sure you can pull it off!
kizuna_friend_d_17:
Yeah! And thanks. I knew I could count on you
to be all supportive like that.[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_18a:
The culinary world might be a bit different, but
I swear—I’m gonna be just as famous as my mom![npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_18b:
The culinary world might be a bit different, but
I swear—I’m gonna be just as famous as my dad![npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_19:
So I guess I can close the book on my little
hunt to find myself.[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_20:
It’s time to start a new chapter—one that’s
all about working toward my new dream![npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_21: And hey, feel free to stop by my room anytime.[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_d_22: Mabosstiff will always be glad to see you.[npcn:6]
